name: Driving Madness!
description:
In Driving Madness! you steer a car by pressing 4 different buttons:

-the inner 2 buttons move the car one road to the left/right

-the outer 2 buttons move the car two roads to the left/right


Pay attention! You have to stay on the roads. If you bump into one of the gray barriers, you have to restart from the beginning!

Let me know what is your highscore in the comment (also other feedback in the comments is much appreciated).

And last but no least: Have fun playing my game and set new highscores :)
